items.sentence: I want to make certain Tom knows what he's supposed to do.
I don't think there's any chance Tom will let you do that.
I'm afraid that Tom might not do what he's supposed to do.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was desperate to do that.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be suspicious.
It can be difficult living on your own for the first time.
The man with the machete had a sadistic smile on his face.
Tom is the one in our family who probably smiles the most.
Tom sat in the car with a policeman on either side of him.
The results of Tom's biopsy show that the tumor is benign.
